title: CHOCOLATE BREAD PUDDING WITH RASPBERRIES RECIPE
directions: In a greased slow cooker, layer half of the bread cubes, chocolate chips and raspberries. Repeat layers. In a bowl, whisk the eggs, cream, milk, sugar and vanilla. Pour over bread mixture.
Cover and cook on high for 2-1/4 to 2-1/2 hours or until a thermometer reads 160Â°. Let stand for 5-10 minutes. Serve with whipped cream and additional raspberries if desired. Yield: 6-8 servings.
ingredients: Whipped cream and additional raspberries, optional
